abstracts.cdata!:
This project will substantially improve
            the physical condition of the highway network. The key
            objectives of the project are to : a) bring the highway
            network to acceptable operating standards through a program
            of road rehabilitation and periodic and routine maintenance;
            b) improve the institutional capability of the Secretariat
            of Public Works (SEOPC) to plan and maintain the road
            system; c) increase the availability of road maintenance
            equipment; d) improve pavement quality; and e) strengthen
            the domestic construction industry.  The project would
            comprise : i) rehabilitation of 839 km of roads; ii) a
            program of periodic maintenance; iii) a program of workshop
            reconstruction; iv) equipment rehabilitation including
            purchase of spare parts; v) road signalling and marking and
            vehicle weight control; and vi) technical assistance for
            training equipment operators, pavement technology transfer,
            road maintenance management, a rural roads inventory, an
            urban transport study, a construction industry study,
            general training and scholarships; and engineering services
            for road design.
